item.Q:
Write the character:
from; self; oneself; since
item.A:
zì
自己 zìjǐ self; (reflexive pronoun); own

item.Q:
Write the character:
and; as well as; but (not); yet (not); (shows causal relation); (shows change of state); (shows contrast)
item.A:
ér
而且 érqiě not only ... but also; as well as; moreover; in addition; furthermore

item.Q:

2: (noun suff.)
item.A:
1: zǐ 2: zi

traditional: 後
hòu

item.Q:

item.Q:
Write the character: ér
(érqiě de ér)
item.A:
and; as well as; but (not); yet (not); (shows causal relation); (shows change of state); (shows contrast)
而且 érqiě not only ... but also; as well as; moreover; in addition; furthermore

item.Q:
Write the character: guó
(guójīa de guó)
item.A:
traditional: 國
country; nation; state; national; surname Guo
国家 (國家) guójīa country; nation

bùzìzai uneasiness; feel uncomfortable
búzìzài uneasiness

traditional: 來自
láizì to come from (a place); From: (in e-mail header)
zìzai free; unrestrained; comfortable; at ease
zìdà arrogant

traditional: 自學
zìxué self-study; study on one's own

zì selfish
zìwǒ self-

traditional: 時而
shíér occasionally; often, but not at fixed times
érshì rather
zìxìaérshàng bottom-up
zhōngzǐ neutron

traditional: 個子
gèzi height; stature; build; size
tiānzǐ the (rightful) Emperor; the "Son of Heaven" (traditional English translation)
xiǎozi boy; young fellow; (derog.) chap

traditional: 電子
diànzǐ electronic; electron

traditional: 電子學
diànzǐxué electronics

traditional: 之後
zhīhòu afterwards; following; later; after

traditional: 以後
yǐhòu after; later; afterwards; following; later on; in the future

traditional: 天後
Tiānhòu Tin Hau (another name for the goddess Matsu); (a number of) days later

traditional: 後人
hòurén later generation

traditional: 後來
hòulái afterwards; later

traditional: 後天
hòutiān day after tomorrow; post-natal

traditional: 而後
érhòu after that; then

traditional: 過後
guòhòu (Taiwan) after the event

traditional: 訊問
xùnwèn interrogate; ask about

traditional: 電訊
diànxùn telecommunications; telecom
rénjīa other people
chūjīa to leave home (to become a Buddhist monk or nun)
dàjīa authority; everyone
jīarén household; (one's) family
jīayòng home-use

traditional: 小說家
xiǎoshuōjīa novelist

traditional: 文學家
wénxuéjīa writer; man of letters

traditional: 電站
diànzhàn a power station; an electricity generating plant
yīxīn wholeheartedly; heart and soul
bùdérénxīn not enjoy popular support; be unpopular
zhōngxīn center; heart; core
rénxīn popular feeling; the will of the people
duōxīn oversensitive; suspicious
hǎoxīn kindness; good intentions
xiǎoxīn to be careful; to take care
xīnzhōng central point; in one's thoughts; in one's heart
xīndé knowledge gained
xīnxiǎng to think; to assume
yòngxīn motive; intention; diligently; attentively
bùzhǐ not only; not merely
zhǐhǎo to have to; to be forced to
zhǐdé have no alternative but to; be obliged to
zhǐshì merely; simply; only; but
zhǐyǒu only
zhǐyào if only; so long as
shàngqù to go up
xìaqu go down (descend); go on (continue)
chūqù to go out

traditional: 過不去
guòbuqù make life difficult for; embarrass; can't make it through

traditional: 過去
guòqu (in the) past; former; previous; to go over; to pass by
bùdéérzhī unknown; unable to find out
bùzhī unknowing(ly)
kěxiǎngérzhī (conj) it is obvious that...
dézhī (find out and) know; learn of
zhīxīn caring; intimate

traditional: 中國
Zhōngguó China; Middle Kingdom
zhōngguó China

Zhōngguówénxué Chinese literature

traditional: 出國
chūguó to go abroad; to leave the country; emigration

traditional: 國學

traditional: 國家
guójīa country; nation

traditional: 國有
guóyǒu nationalized; public; government owned; state-owned
